word_mean: 铟：金属元素，原子序数49，原子量114.82，符号In，因在光谱中有蓝线而得名，用于半导体研究和轴承合金

sentence.Network_en: PPY films were prepared by electro - chemical method onto the indium - tin oxide glass ( ITO ).

sentence.Network_en: Metal indium is an important rare metal new material.
sentence.Network_cn: 金属铟是重要的稀有金属新材料.
